item.title: Video Editor for Short Dance Videos - Upwork
item.description:
Video Editor for Dance Video Sync and Basic Editing

Description:
I am looking for a video editor to fix and enhance some of my dance videos (less than 1 minute videos). The primary task is to sync the dance routine with the song and then add simple, basic edits suitable for short TikTok videos.

Responsibilities:

Sync the dance routine with the provided song (converted from YouTube to MP3).
Perform basic editing to create engaging short TikTok videos.
Ensure videos are of high quality.
Format videos to the TikTok frame size (1080 x 1920) and orientation (upright).
Understand the trends

$20 for 2 songs

Budget: $20
Posted On: June 22, 2024 06:08 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Videography
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Videography
Country: Australia
click to apply

item.title: Expert Video Editor for Real Estate and Commercial Promo Videos - Upwork
item.description:
We are a leading video editing agency dedicated to helping business owners and content creators elevate their brands through our top-notch creative services. We are seeking independent talent who is well-experienced in real estate and corporate video editing and motion graphics, and who is also willing to learn and improve. We are looking for a long-term partnership.


Responsibilities:
-Edit raw videos provided by us into high-quality, attention-grabbing real estate and commercial promo videos.
-Proficient in motion graphics, 3D camera tracking, basic VFX, and typography. Skilled in color grading and basic sound editing.
-Perfectly execute cuts, clip selection, and placement to enhance visual storytelling and audience engagement.
-Maintain a high level of attention to detail to ensure videos are polished and professional, surpassing average standards.
-Utilize a creative mind to add innovative transitions and personal creative touches.
-Ensure timely delivery of projects while maintaining the highest standards of quality. Meeting deadlines is crucial.
-Carefully review reference videos for each project to achieve a similar look and feel, while adding your own creative flair.
-Listen attentively to client feedback to ensure all revisions meet their expectations.
-Stay updated with the latest industry trends and software advancements to continually improve your skills.


Requirements:
-Proven experience in video editing, specifically in real estate and commercial promo videos.
-Proficiency in Adobe Suite or DaVinci Resolve (Premiere Pro, After Effects, Photoshop).
-Strong portfolio showcasing your video editing expertise in this niche.
-Ability to work independently and manage multiple projects simultaneously.
-Excellent and fast communication skills, responsiveness, and attention to detail.
-A creative mindset with a willingness to learn and adapt to new techniques and trends.


This is an ongoing job. You will receive weekly, bi-monthly, or monthly payments on a project basis. In the future, we can discuss a fixed monthly payment if mutually agreeable. We are open to your pricing and offer a flexible, friendly working environment. We prioritize building the best relationships with our clients and independent talents, ensuring quality of life.

If you're interested, please submit your portfolio (preferably YouTube links) and explain why you are perfect for this project. Please avoid sending a template response; otherwise, it will be rejected. We look forward to seeing your creativity and skill!


Budget: $200
Posted On: June 22, 2024 06:02 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Corporate Video, Real Estate Video, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Commercial, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Corporate Video, Real Estate Video, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Commercial, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects
Country: India
click to apply

item.title: Content Curator & Scalper for Highlight Videos of Female Athletic Phenoms - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented content creator to produce high-quality highlight videos of female phenoms excelling in basketball, soccer, and rugby. The videos should showcase amazing athletic plays and be suitable for posting on TikTok and Instagram. The ideal candidate will have experience in video editing, a keen eye for capturing exciting moments, and the ability to create engaging content that resonates with sports enthusiasts.

Responsibilities:
Source and compile footage of female athletes excelling in basketball, soccer, and rugby.
Edit videos to highlight the most impressive plays and moments.
Ensure videos are optimized for TikTok and Instagram formats.
Deliver high-quality, post-able content on a regular basis.


Requirements:
Proven experience in video editing and content creation.
Strong portfolio showcasing previous work, particularly in sports.
Ability to work with tight deadlines and deliver high-quality content.
Knowledge of social media trends and best practices for TikTok and Instagram.
Excellent communication skills and attention to detail.
Compensation:


We will be paying in packages, so the more videos you provide, the more you will be paid. This is a great opportunity for motivated creators to maximize their earnings based on the volume and quality of content delivered.


Important Note:
Our main focus is on the video content itself. While adding captions, music, and effects can enhance the viewer experience, it is not required. These additions would be considered a bonus but are not necessary for the completion of the project. Additionally, the videos should be never-before-seen and not available anywhere else.


-Application Instructions:
     •Please submit your application with the following:
     •A brief cover letter explaining your experience and why you are a good fit for this role.
     •Links to your portfolio or previous work, especially any sports-related content.
     •References from previous clients or employers.


If you have questions on what videos are being referenced or sourced for this job please reach out and we can provide examples.


Posted On: June 22, 2024 05:38 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:MP4, TikTok Video, Social Media Video, Short Video Ad, Gameplay Footage, Video Production, Videography, Content Distribution & Promotion, Content Creation
Skills: MP4, TikTok Video, Social Media Video, Short Video Ad, Gameplay Footage, Video Production, Videography, Content Distribution & Promotion, Content Creation
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: 20 Video Creation from Blog Posts - Urgent - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled freelancer to transform 20 blog articles into engaging and visually appealing videos using AI tools.

Responsibilities:
- Convert 20 blog posts into high-quality videos.
- Ensure videos accurately represent the content and are engaging.
- Use AI tools like Lumen5, Pictory, or similar.

Requirements:
- Proven experience with AI video creation.
- Portfolio showcasing previous AI-generated video projects.
- Strong attention to detail and content accuracy.

Deliverables:
- 20 videos (one for each blog post).
- Each video should be optimized for social media and website use.

Application Process:
- Submit your proposal with a brief overview of your approach.
- Include examples of similar work you have done.

We look forward to collaborating with you!

item.title: Wedding Editing - Upwork
item.description:
Seeking a talented and creative Video Editor to craft a memorable wedding video for a beautiful destination wedding held in Mexico. The ideal candidate will seamlessly blend video footage and photos from the wedding day to create a stunning visual story that captures the magic and emotions of the event.

Responsibilities:

*Review and organize video footage and photos from the wedding day
*Edit and compile video clips to create a cohesive and engaging wedding video
*Incorporate photos into the video, ensuring a seamless integration with video footage
*Add music, transitions, and effects to enhance the overall viewing experience
*Ensure the final video meets quality standards and client expectations

Deliverables:

A full-length wedding video (approximately 20-30 minutes)
A highlight reel (3-5 minutes) showcasing key moments
Two rounds of revisions based on client feedback
High-resolution digital files of the final videos
A digital photo album/slideshow integrated within the video

Qualifications:

Proven experience in video editing, specifically wedding or event videos
Proficiency with video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
Strong storytelling skills through visual media
Ability to work within deadlines and manage multiple tasks efficiently
Excellent communication skills and attention to detail

If available, please share a link to your previous wedding or event video editing work.

We look forward to seeing your creativity and helping us preserve these special memories!



Hourly Range: $30.00-$50.00
Posted On: June 22, 2024 05:21 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Photo Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Photo Editing
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply
